title: Ерөнхий мэдээлэл
desc: Энэхүү төлөвлөгөө нь 8 7 хоногийн төлөвлөгөө юм. Төлөлөгөөний эцэст хүн өөрийн жингээс хамааран ойролцоогоор 5-10 кг булчингийн масс нэмэх боломжтой. Мэдээж таны хичээл зүтгэл, тууштай байдал үр дүнд шууд нөлөөлнө.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Squat
exercises.additionalInfo: It's crucially important that you keep a straight back when you squat! You can ensure your back is straight by keeping your eyes facing forward, chest out, shoulder blades back, and back arched.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Bench Press
exercises.additionalInfo: Ensure you maintain some tension in your abs and don’t allow your lower back to arch excessively.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Pullover
exercises.additionalInfo: Do not bend at the elbows. Do not let the dumbbell go too far forward.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Lateral Raise
exercises.additionalInfo: Don't bring your arms up too high - up to shoulder height is far enough.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Hammer Curl
exercises.additionalInfo: Keep the rep timing slow and control the weight for the whole set.

exercises.name: Two Arm Dumbbell Overhead Tricep Extension
exercises.additionalInfo: Don’t overextend through the lumbar spine, keep your ribcage down by maintaining tension through the abs and glutes.

exercises.name: Standing Calf Raise
exercises.additionalInfo: Use the maximum range of motion by pushing up as high as you can and letting your heel drop as far as possible.

exercises.name: Reverse Hyperextension
exercises.additionalInfo: Arch globally through the spine and focus entirely on erector activation.

exercises.name: Ab Crunches
exercises.additionalInfo: Keep your shoulder blades just off the mat for the entire set.

exercises.name: Flat Bench Dumbbell Flye
exercises.additionalInfo: Don’t squeeze the dumbbell handles excessively tight as this can over recruit the forearms and biceps thereby reducing activation of the pecs.

exercises.name: One Arm Dumbbell Row
exercises.additionalInfo: Keep some tone through your abdominals as you pull the dumbbell into your body to ensure you don’t arch excessively through your spine.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Shoulder Press
exercises.additionalInfo: Keep your back flat against the pad throughout the duration of the exercise.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Bicep Curl
exercises.additionalInfo: Do not let the dumbbells touch your body.

exercises.name: Tricep Kickback
exercises.additionalInfo: Keep your head up and your eyes facing forwards, as this will keep your back straight.

exercises.name: Adduction
exercises.additionalInfo: don’t allow the back to arch as this will tip the hips forward and place the adductors under excessive stretch before the contraction which can affect force output.

exercises.name: Abduction
exercises.additionalInfo: Stand up straight and focus on moving only at the hip. Keep your torso as still as possible.

exercises.name: Seated Calf Raise
exercises.additionalInfo: Don't let your heels touch the floor at any time throughout the exercise.

exercises.name: Crunch
exercises.additionalInfo: Keep your shoulder blades just off the mat for the entire set.

exercises.name: Sissy Squat
exercises.additionalInfo: Form a straight line with your body (from your neck to your knees) by leaning back at the start of the exercise.

exercises.name: Lying Leg Curl
exercises.additionalInfo: Common mistakes with the leg curl are; moving the weight up and down too fast and not using a full range of motion.

exercises.name: Standing Calf Raise
exercises.additionalInfo: Use the maximum range of motion by pushing up as high as you can and letting your heel drop as far as possible.

exercises.name: Chest Dip
exercises.additionalInfo: Staying upright and keeping the elbows in close to increase tricep recruitment.

exercises.name: Push Up
exercises.additionalInfo: Squeeze your glutes and brace your abs before descending in order to keep the ribcage neutral.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Pullover
exercises.additionalInfo: Do not let the dumbbell go too far forward. The starting position is directly above your head and the dumbbell should not go any further than that.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Reverse Flye
exercises.additionalInfo: Move the shoulder within the joint, not the shoulder blade on the ribcage. Keep the abs braced and don’t arch the back at the top of the movement.

exercises.name: Bicep Concentration Curl
exercises.additionalInfo: Maintain a slight bend in the elbow at the bottom of the movement in order to keep tension through the biceps.

exercises.name: Lying Two Arm Dumbbell Tricep Extension
exercises.additionalInfo: It's important to keep your elbows in and facing toward your hips. Don't let them flare out as you lower the dumbbells down.

exercises.name: Obliques Curl
exercises.additionalInfo: Always keep your back straight, eyes facing forwards, and bend at the torso only.

exercises.name: A 60 minute walk/cycle ride (at a good pace, based on your current fitness level)
